official-title.#text:
To amend the William Wilberforce Trafficking Victims Protection Reauthorization Act of 2008 to
			 require consultation with State and local elected officials and a public
			 hearing before awarding grants or contracts for housing facilities for
			 unaccompanied alien children.

cosponsor.#tail: ) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Our Communities, Our Choices Act of 2014
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Our Communities, Our Choices Act of 2014

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: is amended by adding at the end the following:

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Section 235(i) of the William Wilberforce Trafficking Victims Protection Reauthorization Act of
			 2008
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: William Wilberforce Trafficking Victims Protection Reauthorization Act of 2008/s:235/ss:i

header.#text:
Requiring consultation with State and local elected officials and a public hearing before awarding
			 grants or contracts for housing facilities for unaccompanied alien
			 children

text.#text:
Before awarding any grant or contract under this subsection that provide for housing of
			 unaccompanied alien children in a facility that is not on property of the
			 Federal Government, the

consult with State and local elected officials regarding the location of the facility as well as
			 the duration of the award and the safety, security, and funding of the
			 facility; and

conduct a public hearing, no earlier than 90 days after the announcement of a potential location
			 for such facility, for which—

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
is in attendance in an official
			 capacity for the purpose of receiving public comments.
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Department of Health and Human Services

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 5138 IH: Our Communities, Our Choices Act of 2014
